Gian Luca Buoncompagni

Engineering Manager and Front End Specialist

I am a web front-end specialist and Engineering Manager with more than 20 years of experience, with a proven track record of directing diverse, international engineering teams to deliver complex, feature-rich SaaS platforms.

Currently, I work as the Head of Front End and Customer Integration at Tailoor in Milan, Italy, where I led the client side development of a large-scale, multi-tenant e-commerce SaaS platform and integration with third-party systems for custom projects. My role focuses on architecting scalable front-end systems and fostering a collaborative environment to deliver high-quality solutions to meet and exceed customer expectations.

Selected Previous Works

  • Vivaticket
    In charge of shaping the client-side development and team management for the new international B2C portal (vivaticket.com), coordinating with distributed international teams.
  • Il Fatto Quotidiano
    Led the redesign and front-end development of the main website (serving 1.6 million daily page views), focusing on performance optimization and third-party API integrations.

Personal Projects

  • Sharesplit
    Mobile PWA to manage shared expenses for groups and families
  • Impicciato
    Hangman-like mobile game, built with react.js
  • Studio Pym
    Website for an editorial office in Milan, with custom CMS based on Wordpress
  • NanoScore
    Interactive mobile music score editor based on abc music notation

Previous projects for different web agencies include, among others, many international clients such as LAVAZZA (tablet and mobile version of 2014 calendar, hybrid app for Android and Ios),FERRARI (Launch website for Formula 1 F138 singleseater), KINDER (entire international network of local corporate websites).

Skills and technologies

  • Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+)
  • Frameworks: React, NextJs, React Router , React Query, i18next, Vuejs
  • Design Systems: Chakra UI, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/UI, Emotion, css-in-js
  • Tooling: Nx Monorepo, Webpack 5 (Module Federation), npm, yarn, vite
  • 3D Technologies: Three.js, React Three Fiber, Drei, WebGL
  • CI/CD: Azure DevOpsPipelines, Nx Cloud, GitFlow
  • Testing & Quality: Jest, Cypress, Playwright
  • Agile methodologies:Scrum, Kanban
